title: Nocturnal
description:
After a difficult journey across a troubled sea, Ardeshir , soldier of the Enduring Flame, returns home to the island of Nahran, where everything is obscured by a peculiar Mist. To uncover the cause, you must wield the sacred flame of your ancestors and carve your way to the island’s center, where secret locations and powerful abilities await. As a soldier of the Enduring Flame , you must uncover the mystery of what happened to your order, battling any who stand between you and your goal: to free the island from the Darkness.
Something sinister cloaks the island of Nahran, and whatever dwells within it devours everything in its path. To discover its source and bring an end to this chaos, you must fearlessly wade into the Mist’s depths. But be warned: one cannot survive in the Mist for long. Bramble: The Mountain King
As the Mist is your enemy, Fire will be your ally in your journey.  Flame can ward off the Mist, ignite the scenery, turn on machinery, and be used to burn beings of dark magic impervious to conventional weaponry . The Mist covers a vast expanse and hides powerful abilities for those willing to explore its mysteries. Gain ashes by killing enemies and exploring your environment and make an offering to the Phoenix statues to give you new abilities and stat boosts you need to survive .

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i7-3610QM or AMD Ryzen 5 3500U
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GT 650M or Radeon HD 4870 X2
